title: THE 5 WORST TRACTORS YOU COULD BUY THIS YEAR! TYPES AND MODELS!

subtasks: Researching warranty coverage and dealer support proximity.
Considering modern tractor models for reliability and maintenance ease.
Avoiding rental or auction source tractors.
Checking for loader compatibility and quick attach system.
Steering clear of specific problematic models like Kubota B3350, John Deere 2320, and 2305.
